bibl.title: with contributions by several authors, Samothrace. 7: The Rotunda of Arsinoe. 1: Text; - 2: Plates. (Bollingen Series. 60.)
bibl.note: Vol. 7 focuses on the magnificent marble Rotunda dedicated by Queen Arsinoe II for cult purposes early in the third century B.C.
McCREDIE James R., Georges ROUX, Stuart M. SHAW and John KURTICH, with contributions by several authors, Samothrace. 7: The Rotunda of Arsinoe. 1: Text; - 2: Plates. (Bollingen Series. 60.)
Princeton, N.J., Princeton University Press, 1992, 4Â°, xix-444 pp., 1 front., 167 + 343 figg.; - vi-92 pll. ISBN 0-691-09917-0. $250.
